Keywords: Assassin , Avengers , Brute , Monster , Winter Guard
Real Name: Jennifer Walters
Special Powers
GREEN FIRE: Friendly standard characters that are adjacent or have the Winter Guard keyword can use Poison.
SINGLE-MINDED PURPOSE: Charge, Flurry.
TOE-TO-TOE WITH THE AVENGERS: Battle Fury, Close Combat Expert. // When Winter Hulk KO's an opposing character, after resolutions remove all action tokens from her.

tyroclix
[QUOTE]I think she's prime worthy. She ignores Shape Change and she enables friendlies to use Poison. Plus she can remove action tokens from herself. Plus she Charge + Flurries for 12av and 5dv. That's all potentially game changing.[/QUOTE] AND can't be given action tokens by opposing effects, and gets SAFEGUARD: Mind Control - two things a TON of new characters are doing.
